en.Caption: Caption
en.Captions reflect image content with prec: Captions reflect image content with precision.
en.Upload an image and let our smart captio: Upload an image and let our smart captioning engine describe it with precision.
en.Supported formats: JPG, PNG. Max size: 5: Supported formats: JPG, PNG. Max size: 5MB.
en.a rabbit running down the road in the co: a rabbit running down the road in the countryside
en.Discover how AI captioning can serve rea: Discover how AI captioning can serve real communities and solve practical challenges.
en.Our captioning tool helps blind users un: Our captioning tool helps blind users understand images through audio descriptions, enhancing independence and digital access.
en.Teachers can use AI-generated captions t: Teachers can use AI-generated captions to describe visual content to students with learning or visual disabilities.
en.Public institutions can auto-caption ima: Public institutions can auto-caption image databases for documentation, accessibility, and searchability.
en.Mobile apps can integrate captioning to: Mobile apps can integrate captioning to describe photos in real time, improving UX and accessibility.
en.Upload an image and hear its description: Upload an image and hear its description instantly â€” designed for blind users and educators.
en.Name: Name
en.Does not understand cultural context, pr: Does not understand cultural context, produces generic descriptions
en.This web application is part of a master: This web application is part of a master's graduation project at the Syrian Virtual University.
en.It uses artificial intelligence to gener: It uses artificial intelligence to generate descriptive captions for uploaded images.
en.and the AI model is integrated through a: and the AI model is integrated through a custom Python module.
en.The frontend is designed to be simple an: The frontend is designed to be simple and intuitive, with plans for future enhancements.
en.Demonstrate practical integration of AI: Demonstrate practical integration of AI in web applications
en.Enable automatic image understanding and: Enable automatic image understanding and description
en.Provide a clean, extensible architecture: Provide a clean, extensible architecture for future development
